    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0031104</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">El nombre de los músculos 1</string>
            <string language="en">The names of muscles 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Namen von Muskeln 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les noms des muscles 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os nomes dos músculos 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I nomi dei muscoli 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα ονόματα των μυών 1</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno debe buscar los nombres de unos músculos que aparecen señalados en la imagen de los músculos del cuerpo vistos por delante.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student must look for the names of muscles which are marked on the image of the muscles of the body seen from the front.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Músculos</string>
            <string language="en">Muscles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer nach den 
Namen der Muskeln suchen muß, die auf dem Bild der Muskeln des 
Körpers gekennzeichnet werden, der von der Frontseite gesehen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
rechercher les noms des muscles qui sont marqués sur l'image des 
muscles du corps vu de l'avant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante deve procurar os 
nomes dos músculos que são marcados na imagem dos músculos do corpo
visto da parte dianteira.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve cercare i nomi dei 
muscoli che sono contrassegnati sull'immagine dei muscoli del corpo 
visto dalla parte anteriore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να ψάξει τα 
ονόματα των μυών που είναι χαρακτηρισμένα στην εικόνα των μυών 
του σώματος που βλέπει από το μέτωπο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Muskeln</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Muscles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
